But, David Vitter said, we want full repeal of Obamacare for a simple reason-- the big problem with the bill, the big problem with the plan aren't at the margins, they are the core, and the big problems can't be fixed with... changing a comma, or changing the punctuation or revising one or two or five or 10 sentences. The big problems are at the core, with the demand that every man, woman and child in the nation has to go onto the market and buy a particular product. `` That's why we demand repeal,'' said David Vitter , who said`` we will be replacing this huge burdensome bill with a targeted approach.''
